process_details.description: The Manage Treatment Plans and Outcomes business process monitors implementation of authorized treatment plans and tracks member outcomes to ensure care goals are being achieved. This process includes ongoing assessment, plan adjustments, and outcome measurement.
results: Treatment plan modifications identified and implemented.
Outcome reports generated for quality improvement.
Case closure initiated if goals achieved.
process_steps: Review current treatment plan and goals.
If modifications needed, revise treatment plan.
Coordinate with providers on plan changes.
If goals achieved, initiate case closure process.
END: Complete treatment plan monitoring cycle.
process_details.constraints: Treatment plan monitoring must occur at intervals specified in the plan. Outcome measures must be evidence-based and appropriate for the member's condition. Plan modifications require appropriate authorization. Member engagement is essential for accurate outcome assessment.
failures: Member not engaged in treatment plan.
Barriers to plan implementation not addressed.
Treatment plan not achieving desired outcomes.
performance_measures: Percentage of members achieving treatment goals
